casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellant, v. Madaris, Appellee.

[Cite as State v. Madaris, 123 Ohio St.3d 127, 2009-Ohio-4903.]

(No. 2008-1052 Submitted August 11, 2009 Decided September 22, 2009.) Joseph T. Deters, Hamilton County Prosecuting Attorney, and Scott M. Heenan, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellant. Timothy Young, State Public Defender, and Sarah M. Schregardus, Assistant State Public Defender, for appellee.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of State v. Harris, 122 Ohio St.3d 373, 2009-Ohio-3323, 911 N.E.2d 882.

Moyer, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur.
